title: Did the newspaper "The Grinch " refer in Ed's book to the word "Standing "?
subtitle: The promotion between the new film "Grunch" and "Awesome Peanut" is real, but the character never mentioned peanuts as "green and salty as my balls."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: In an announcement entitled "Awesome Peanuts," the slogan "Green and Salt" appeared. Just like my nuts."
